verses.verse: בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> On that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נָתַ֞ן <S%H5414><s%> give הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> did the king אֲחַשְׁוֵרוֹשׁ֙ <S%H325><s%> Ahasuerus לְאֶסְתֵּ֣ר <S%H635><s%> unto Esther הַמַּלְכָּ֔ה <S%H4436><s%> the queen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house הָמָ֖ן <S%H2001><s%> of Haman צֹרֵ֣ר <S%H6887><s%> enemy [הַיְּהוּדִיִּים כ] (הַיְּהוּדִ֑ים <S%H3064><s%> Jew ק) וּמָרְדֳּכַ֗י <S%H4782><s%> And Mordecai בָּ֚א <S%H935><s%> came לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִגִּ֥ידָה <S%H5046><s%> had told אֶסְתֵּ֖ר <S%H635><s%> for Esther מַ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> what הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he לָֽהּ׃

וַיָּ֨סַר <S%H5493><s%> took off הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> טַבַּעְתּ֗וֹ <S%H2885><s%> his ring אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which הֶֽעֱבִיר֙ <S%H5674><s%> which he had taken מֵֽהָמָ֔ן <S%H2001><s%> from Haman וַֽיִּתְּנָ֖הּ <S%H5414><s%> and gave לְמָרְדֳּכָ֑י <S%H4782><s%> it unto Mordecai וַתָּ֧שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> set אֶסְתֵּ֛ר <S%H635><s%> And Esther אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מָרְדֳּכַ֖י <S%H4782><s%> Mordecai עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> over the house הָמָֽן׃ <S%H2001><s%> of Haman פ

וַתּ֣וֹסֶף <S%H3254><s%> yet again אֶסְתֵּ֗ר <S%H635><s%> And Esther וַתְּדַבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> spake לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וַתִּפֹּ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> and fell down לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> at רַגְלָ֑יו <S%H7272><s%> his feet וַתֵּ֣בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> him with tears וַתִּתְחַנֶּן־ <S%H2603><s%> and besought ל֗וֹ לְהַֽעֲבִיר֙ <S%H5674><s%> to put away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָעַת֙ <S%H7451><s%> the mischief הָמָ֣ן <S%H2001><s%> of Haman הָֽאֲגָגִ֔י <S%H91><s%> the Agagite וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> מַֽחֲשַׁבְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4284><s%> and his device אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which חָשַׁ֖ב <S%H2803><s%> that he had devised עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הַיְּהוּדִֽים׃ <S%H3064><s%> against the Jews

וַיּ֤וֹשֶׁט <S%H3447><s%> held out הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king לְאֶסְתֵּ֔ר <S%H635><s%> toward Esther אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> שַׁרְבִ֣ט <S%H8275><s%> sceptre הַזָּהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> the golden וַתָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose אֶסְתֵּ֔ר <S%H635><s%> So Esther וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> and stood לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

וַ֠תֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king ט֜וֹב <S%H2896><s%> If it please וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if מָצָ֧אתִי <S%H4672><s%> and if I have found חֵ֣ן <S%H2580><s%> favour לְפָנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> in his sight וְכָשֵׁ֤ר <S%H3787><s%> [seem] right הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> and the thing לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וְטוֹבָ֥ה <S%H2896><s%> and I [be] pleasing אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> his בְּעֵינָ֑יו <S%H5869><s%> in his eyes יִכָּתֵ֞ב <S%H3789><s%> let it be written לְהָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> to reverse אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסְּפָרִ֗ים <S%H5612><s%> the letters מַחֲשֶׁ֜בֶת <S%H4284><s%> devised הָמָ֤ן <S%H2001><s%> by Haman בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הַמְּדָ֙תָא֙ <S%H4099><s%> of Hammedatha הָאֲגָגִ֔י <S%H91><s%> the Agagite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which כָּתַ֗ב <S%H3789><s%> which he wrote לְאַבֵּד֙ <S%H6><s%> to destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיְּהוּדִ֔ים <S%H3064><s%> the Jews אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְדִינ֥וֹת <S%H4082><s%> provinces הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> which [are] in all the king's

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> For אֵיכָכָ֤ה <S%H349><s%> For how אוּכַל֙ <S%H3201><s%> can I endure וְֽרָאִ֔יתִי <S%H7200><s%> to see בָּרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> the evil אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> that shall come אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> my people וְאֵֽיכָכָ֤ה <S%H349><s%> how אוּכַל֙ <S%H3201><s%> can I endure וְֽרָאִ֔יתִי <S%H7200><s%> to see בְּאָבְדַ֖ן <S%H13><s%> the destruction מוֹלַדְתִּֽי׃ <S%H4138><s%> begotten ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹשׁ֙ <S%H325><s%> Ahasuerus לְאֶסְתֵּ֣ר <S%H635><s%> unto Esther הַמַּלְכָּ֔ה <S%H4436><s%> the queen וּֽלְמָרְדֳּכַ֖י <S%H4782><s%> and to Mordecai הַיְּהוּדִ֑י <S%H3064><s%> the Jew הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> the house הָמָ֜ן <S%H2001><s%> of Haman נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> Behold I have given לְאֶסְתֵּ֗ר <S%H635><s%> Esther וְאֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> תָּל֣וּ <S%H8518><s%> and him they have hanged עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָעֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> upon the gallows עַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> he שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> because he laid יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand [בַּיְּהוּדִיִּים כ] (בַּיְּהוּדִֽים׃ <S%H3064><s%> the Jew ק)

וְ֠אַתֶּם <S%H859><s%> now you כִּתְב֨וּ <S%H3789><s%> Write עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto הַיְּהוּדִ֜ים <S%H3064><s%> ye also for the Jews כַּטּ֤וֹב <S%H2896><s%> as it liketh בְּעֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5869><s%> you בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> in the king's וְחִתְמ֖וּ <S%H2856><s%> and seal בְּטַבַּ֣עַת <S%H2885><s%> ring הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [it] with the king's כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כְתָ֞ב <S%H3791><s%> for the writing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִכְתָּ֣ב <S%H3789><s%> which is written בְּשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> name הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> in the king's וְנַחְתּ֛וֹם <S%H2856><s%> and sealed בְּטַבַּ֥עַת <S%H2885><s%> ring הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> with the king's אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else לְהָשִֽׁיב׃ <S%H7725><s%> may no man reverse

וַיִּקָּרְא֣וּ <S%H7121><s%> called סֹפְרֵֽי־ <S%H5608><s%> scribes הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then were the king's בָּֽעֵת־ <S%H6256><s%> at that time הַ֠הִיא <S%H1931><s%> he בַּחֹ֨דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֜י <S%H7992><s%> in the third הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he חֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> that [is] the month סִיוָ֗ן <S%H5510><s%> Sivan בִּשְׁלוֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> on the three וְעֶשְׂרִים֮ <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth בּוֹ֒ וַיִּכָּתֵ֣ב <S%H3789><s%> [day] thereof and it was written כְּֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded מָרְדֳּכַ֣י <S%H4782><s%> according to all that Mordecai אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַיְּהוּדִ֡ים <S%H3064><s%> unto the Jews וְאֶ֣ל <S%H413><s%> and to הָאֲחַשְׁדַּרְפְּנִֽים־ <S%H323><s%> and to the lieutenants וְהַפַּחוֹת֩ <S%H6346><s%> and the deputies וְשָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> and rulers הַמְּדִינ֜וֹת <S%H4082><s%> of the provinces אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> are מֵהֹ֣דּוּ <S%H1912><s%> which [are] from India וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> unto כּ֗וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> unto Ethiopia שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> and seven וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וּמֵאָה֙ <S%H3967><s%> an hundred מְדִינָ֔ה <S%H4082><s%> provinces מְדִינָ֤ה <S%H4082><s%> unto every province וּמְדִינָה֙ <S%H4082><s%> to every כִּכְתָבָ֔הּ <S%H3789><s%> describe וְעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> thereof and unto every people וָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> people כִּלְשֹׁנ֑וֹ <S%H3956><s%> after their language וְאֶ֨ל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַיְּהוּדִ֔ים <S%H3064><s%> and to the Jews כִּכְתָבָ֖ם <S%H3789><s%> describe וְכִלְשׁוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H3956><s%> and according to their language

וַיִּכְתֹּ֗ב <S%H3789><s%> And he wrote בְּשֵׁם֙ <S%H8034><s%> name הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> in the king אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹ֔שׁ <S%H325><s%> Ahasuerus' וַיַּחְתֹּ֖ם <S%H2856><s%> and sealed בְּטַבַּ֣עַת <S%H2885><s%> ring הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [it] with the king's וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> and sent סְפָרִ֡ים <S%H5612><s%> letters בְּיַד֩ <S%H3027><s%> by הָרָצִ֨ים <S%H7323><s%> posts בַּסּוּסִ֜ים <S%H5483><s%> on horseback רֹכְבֵ֤י <S%H7392><s%> [and] riders הָרֶ֙כֶשׁ֙ <S%H7409><s%> on mules הָֽאֲחַשְׁתְּרָנִ֔ים <S%H327><s%> camels בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> [and] young הָֽרַמָּכִֽים׃ <S%H7424><s%> dromedaries

אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> who נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> granted הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Wherein the king לַיְּהוּדִ֣ים ׀ <S%H3064><s%> the Jews אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every עִיר־ <S%H5892><s%> which [were] in every city וָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> city לְהִקָּהֵל֮ <S%H6950><s%> to gather themselves together וְלַעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> and to stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and נַפְשָׁם֒ <S%H5315><s%> for their life לְהַשְׁמִיד֩ <S%H8045><s%> to destroy וְלַהֲרֹ֨ג <S%H2026><s%> to slay וּלְאַבֵּ֜ד <S%H6><s%> and to cause to perish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the entire חֵ֨יל <S%H2426><s%> army עַ֧ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וּמְדִינָ֛ה <S%H4082><s%> and province הַצָּרִ֥ים <S%H6696><s%> that would assault אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> טַ֣ף <S%H2945><s%> them [both] little ones וְנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> and women וּשְׁלָלָ֖ם <S%H7998><s%> and [to take] the spoil לָבֽוֹז׃ <S%H962><s%> of them for a prey

בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> Upon one בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְדִינ֖וֹת <S%H4082><s%> in all the provinces הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king אֲחַשְׁוֵר֑וֹשׁ <S%H325><s%> Ahasuerus בִּשְׁלוֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> three עָשָׂ֛ר <S%H6240><s%> ten לְחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month שְׁנֵים־ <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> ten הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he חֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> which [is] the month אֲדָֽר׃ <S%H143><s%> Adar
